com.tguzik.tests

Class Normalize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tguzik.tests.Normalize

  • public final class Normalize
extends Object
    Unit test utility that normalizes Windows (\r\n) and legacy OSX (\r) line endings into unix-style (\n). This is placed in main sources (as opposed to unit test sources) to allow using this class in projects that depend on this library.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Tomasz Guzik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Normalize() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String newLines(String input)
      Replaces different line ending styles (Windows \r\n, legacy Mac \r) with single new line character (\n).
      static String tabsToSpaces(String input, int tabWidth)
      Replaces all tabulation (\t) characters with spaces.

    • Constructor Detail

        public Normalize()

    • Method Detail

      • newLines

        @Nullable
public static String newLines(@Nullable
                       String input)

        Replaces different line ending styles (Windows \r\n, legacy Mac \r) with single new line character (\n).

        Example usage: 
         assertEquals( expected, Normalize.newLines( actual ) );
        Parameters:
        input - nullable input string
        Returns:
        new string with all newline sequences replaced with LF ending

      • tabsToSpaces

        @Nullable
public static String tabsToSpaces(@Nullable
                           String input,
                           int tabWidth)

        Replaces all tabulation (\t) characters with spaces.

        Parameters:
        input - nullable input string
        tabWidth - width in spaces of each tabulation character
        Returns:
        new string with all tabulation characters replaces by tabs or null if input parameter was null
